title: SQLALTER COLUMN Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLALTER COLUMN Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
ALTER COLUMN
The
ALTER COLUMN
command is used to change the data type of a column in a table.
The following SQL changes the data type of the column named "BirthDate" in 
the "Employees" table to type year:
Example
ALTER TABLE Employees
ALTER COLUMN BirthDate 
  year;

Reference

❯
★
+1
